list.abs: the purveyance of supplies for the army对军队补给品的供应

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the senses 'foresight' and 'pre-arrangement'): from Old French porveance, from Latin providentia 'foresight' (see providence)

auth_sentence.content: The powers of purveyance have declined, in foreign countries as well as our own.
